name: Lupin Sansei Typing Soft: 26+α No Kagi
overview: Lupin Sansei Typing Soft: 26+α No Kagi is a typing tutor game which mixes the gameplay with static cutscenes from the manga. In this game players will get the chance to take part in Lupin, Daisuke Jigen, Goemon Ishikawa, Fujiko Mine or Zenigata Keibu's adventures and after watching a short cutscene, players will need to complete a series of mini-games which involve pressing a specific key on the keyboard or typing words in Japanese. Overall, the game features 25 short stories with this kind of gameplay and will always show an explanation of how to play before starting each mini-game.
